thing.title: Quick Klein Bottle - OBSOLETE
thing.author: syvwlch
thing.description: EDIT: This is superceded by thisthingiverse.com/thing:449Wanted to see how badly some of the tool chain would choke on a Klein bottle, so I made one the simplest one I could. Had to do it by hand in Blender, since this is kryptonite for TopMod.I think I got all the normals oriented properly... at least it renders ok.
